# canonicalCombiningClass

**Instance Property**

The canonical combining class of the scalar.

## Declaration

```swift
var canonicalCombiningClass: Unicode.CanonicalCombiningClass { get }
```

## Discussion

This property corresponds to the “Canonical_Combining_Class” property in the [http://www.unicode.org/versions/latest/].
